name: Hausrat auch gegen Teilzahlung LCCN2004665827 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Hausrat auch gegen Teilzahlung Abstract: Poster shows a table, chair, lamp and picture on wall. Accompanying text announces housegoods available, including on installment plans, at the "Hausrat" Gemeinnütze Gesellschaft m.b.H. to spouses of veterans, those diabled by the war, and families with many children in Greater-Berlin and the province of Brandenburg. Directions are included. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 58 x 36 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Bernhard.; Title from item.
